Package de.stocker.controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stocker.controller.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMainController
    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMainController
    The Class MainController implements the interface IMainController to allow the separate functional units to communicate with each other according to the mediator pattern.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

      Saves all persistence information to file.

      Saves the last position of the watchlist frame to restore the watchlist to that position after re-opening the frame.

      Updates data provider after a preferences change.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainController

        public MainController()
        Instantiates a new main controller. The main controller generates and connects all the different parts of the application in its constructor: Main frame, persistence, preferences, network, data model, alarms.

      • resetApplication

        public void resetApplication()
        Resets the application: clears all frames from the desktop pane and resets the data model to an empty state. Preference changes are preserved and can be reset separately.
        Specified by:
        resetApplication in interface IMainController
